title: POLAMI Multi-Wavelength Polarization Study of AGN Jets: A Millimeter-Optical Comparison
summary: Millimeter-band polarimetry offers a powerful probe of AGN jets, accessing regions less affected by opacity and Faraday rotation than at longer radio wavelengths. As part of the POLAMI program, we have conducted 14 years of 1 mm and 3 mm polarization monitoring of a sample of gamma-ray-bright blazars with the IRAM 30-m telescope, complemented here with long-term optical polarimetric observations from multiple facilities. We aim to test whether current models of parsec-scale jet physics are consistent with observed multi-band polarization behavior. Using a Bayesian framework, we derive intrinsic mean flux densities and modulation indices for total flux and fractional polarization, and characterize EVPA variability using circular statistics. We then examine how these quantities reflecting variability properties across millimeter and optical bands relate to synchrotron peak frequency, jet orientation, and radio/gamma-ray luminosities. BL Lac objects exhibit, on average, higher fractional polarization and lower EVPA variability than FSRQs at all wavelengths. Fractional polarization increases with frequency, consistent with increasingly ordered magnetic fields at shorter wavelengths. BL Lacs also show more frequent alignment of EVPAs between optical and millimeter bands, whereas FSRQs display weaker coherence. EVPA variability correlates positively with radio and gamma-ray luminosities and negatively with synchrotron peak frequency, most strongly in the optical. We further find a positive correlation between EVPA spread and fractional polarization variability, suggesting a direct link between magnetic-field structure and polarization dynamics.

AI.tldr: 通过毫米波（millimeter-band）和光学偏振监测发现，BL Lac天体（BL Lac objects）比平谱射电类星体（FSRQs）具有更高的偏振度（fractional polarization）和更低的位置角（EVPA）变异性，且偏振度随频率增加而升高，表明短波长下磁场有序性增强，同时位置角变异性与射电/伽马射线光度正相关、与同步辐射峰值频率负相关。
AI.background: 毫米波段偏振测量为研究活动星系核（AGN）喷流提供了独特视角，能探测比长波射电波段受不透明度（opacity）和法拉第旋转（Faraday rotation）影响更小的区域。
AI.data: 数据来源于IRAM 30米望远镜进行的1毫米和3毫米偏振监测（POLAMI计划）以及多台设施提供的长期光学偏振观测数据。
AI.method: 采用贝叶斯(Bayesian)框架分析毫米波和光学偏振数据，结合圆统计方法表征电场矢量角(EVPA)变异性，并计算平均通量密度、调制指数等参数。
AI.result: BL Lac天体在所有波段平均表现出比FSRQs更高的偏振度（fractional polarization）和更低的位置角（EVPA）变异性。

title: Galactic core-tail structure in BEC dark matter with Kapitza potential
summary: Recently, the experimental realization of a Kapitza potential in a Bose-Einstein Condensate (BEC) has been reported for the first time in literature, motivating further theoretical investigations of such system. At the same time, in the astrophysical context, BEC dark matter models have been widely studied as a possible phenomenological explanation for the dark matter phenomena. We model the galactic structure with an inner cored profile obtained from the ground state equilibrium solution of the Schroedinger-Poisson together with a Kapitza-BEC like interaction for the tail region. We find reasonable agreement of the model with representative galaxy rotation curves available in the SPARC catalogue.

AI.tldr: 首次将卡皮查势（Kapitza potential）引入玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚态（BEC）暗物质模型，通过结合薛定谔-泊松方程基态平衡解与卡皮查-BEC相互作用，成功模拟了具有中心核区与尾部分布的星系结构，其预测与SPARC星表星系旋转曲线观测数据吻合良好。
AI.background: 研究主题为探索玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚态(BEC)中的卡皮查势(Kapitza potential)与暗物质模型的关联性及其在星系旋转曲线中的适用性。
AI.data: data：使用SPARC星表（Spitzer Photometry and Accurate Rotation Curves）中的代表性星系旋转曲线数据。
AI.method: 采用薛定谔-泊松方程(Schroedinger-Poisson)基态平衡解构建星系核心区密度分布，并在外围区域引入类卡皮查势(Kapitza potential)的玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚体(BEC)相互作用模型。
AI.result: 在玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚态(BEC)暗物质模型中，结合薛定谔-泊松方程的基态平衡解与卡皮查(Kapitza)式相互作用，能够合理拟合SPARC星表中的典型星系旋转曲线。

title: Gravitational perturbations of nonlocal black holes
comment: 12 pages, accepted for publication in Physical Review D
summary: We derive the master equations governing axial and polar gravitational perturbations of a generic static and spherically symmetric black hole spacetime within the framework of the revised Deser--Woodard nonlocal gravity theory. We then apply our general formalism to a one-parameter family of black hole solutions recently obtained by the present authors, representing small first-order deviations from the Schwarzschild geometry. We provide well-motivated arguments that allow us to render the analysis analytically tractable. Our results provide the first complete perturbative characterization of nonlocal black holes and lay the groundwork for future investigations.

AI.tldr: 该论文在修正的Deser-Woodard非局部引力理论框架下，首次完整推导了静态球对称黑洞（black hole）时空的轴向和极向引力扰动（gravitational perturbations）主方程，并将其应用于作者近期提出的偏离史瓦西几何（Schwarzschild geometry）的单参数黑洞解族，为未来研究奠定了基础。
AI.background: 研究聚焦于修正的德塞尔-伍德非局域引力理论（revised Deser-Woodard nonlocal gravity theory）框架下静态球对称黑洞时空的轴向和极向引力扰动。
AI.data: 数据来源于作者最近获得的一族单参数黑洞解（one-parameter family of black hole solutions），该解表示对史瓦西几何（Schwarzschild geometry）的一阶微小偏离。
AI.method: 采用修订的德塞尔-伍德沃德非局部引力理论框架，推导了静态球对称黑洞时空轴向和极向引力扰动的主控方程。
AI.result: 在修正的Deser-Woodard非局域引力理论框架下，首次完整建立了静态球对称黑洞时空轴向和极向引力扰动的主控方程。

title: Spectroscopic confirmation of a large and luminous galaxy with weak emission lines at $\mathbf{z = 13.53}$
summary: We present JWST/NIRSpec PRISM observations of a robust galaxy candidate at $z\simeq14$, selected from pure-parallel NIRCam imaging; PAN-z14-1. The NIRSpec spectrum allows confirmation of this source at $z_{\rm spec}=13.53^{+0.05}_{-0.06}$ through modeling of the Lyman-$α$ break. PAN-z14-1 is the fourth most distant galaxy known to date and is extremely luminous ($M_{\rm UV}=-20.6\pm0.2$), with a blue UV-continuum slope ($β=-2.26\pm0.08$) and a large physical size ($r_{\rm c}=233\pm10\, \rm pc$). We fail to detect any rest-frame UV emission lines at $\geq 2σ$ significance, with upper limits sufficiently constraining to exclude the possibility of strong line emission. In terms of its physical properties, PAN-z14-1 is remarkably similar to the previously confirmed $z_{\rm spec}=14.18$ galaxy GS-z14-0. The lack of strong emission lines and large physical size is consistent with an emerging picture of two potentially distinct galaxy populations at $z>10$, distinguished by star-formation rate surface density. In this scenario, PAN-z14-1 is a second example of a ``normal'', extended, luminous, star-forming galaxy at $z \simeq 14$, and differs markedly from the other class of extremely compact galaxies with strong emission lines recently uncovered at extreme redshifts with JWST. These results highlight the importance of further spectroscopic confirmation of $z>10$ galaxy candidates in order to fully understand the diversity of properties displayed by the first galaxies.

AI.tldr: 通过JWST/NIRSpec PRISM观测确认了红移(redshift)z=13.53的极亮星系PAN-z14-1，其大物理尺寸(233±10 pc)和缺乏强发射线的特征支持了z>10星系存在两种不同星族(star-formation rate surface density区分)的新观点。
AI.background: 研究聚焦于利用JWST（詹姆斯·韦伯太空望远镜）观测和分析极高红移（$z>10$）星系的性质多样性，特别是探索宇宙早期星系形成与演化的两种潜在不同星族。
AI.data: 数据来源为JWST（James Webb Space Telescope）的NIRSpec（Near-Infrared Spectrograph）PRISM（低分辨率棱镜模式）观测和NIRCam（Near-Infrared Camera）纯平行成像。
AI.method: 采用JWST/NIRSpec PRISM观测数据，通过建模莱曼断裂(Lyman-α break)确认红移，并分析紫外连续谱斜率(UV-continuum slope)、物理尺寸(physical size)及静止帧紫外发射线(rest-frame UV emission lines)的探测上限。
AI.result: PAN-z14-1是一个红移(redshift)为13.53的极亮（$M_{\rm UV}=-20.6\pm0.2$）、具有蓝色UV连续谱斜率（$β=-2.26\pm0.08$）和大物理尺寸（$r_{\rm c}=233\pm10\, \rm pc$）的星系，与红移14.18的星系GS-z14-0物理性质相似，代表了一类在$z>10$时扩展、明亮且缺乏强发射线的正常恒星形成星系。

title: The Role of Plasma Lensing in Fast Radio Bursts
comment: 15 pages, 7 figures, accepted for publication in ApJ
summary: Growing evidence indicates that some fast radio bursts (FRBs) reside in dense, magneto-ionic environments where extrinsic propagation effects can substantially reshape the observed signal. Within a 1D Gaussian plasma-lens framework, we show that small, monotonic variations in the incidence angle of the FRB wavefront naturally generate both downward and upward sub-burst frequency drifts. We further demonstrate that distinct lensed paths that probe different rotation measures (RMs), can produce orthogonal polarization-angle (PA) jumps at gigahertz frequencies. In this picture, a $\sim 90^\circ$ PA transition requires only a modest RM contrast of order a few $\times10~\rm{rad~m^{-2}}$ between the multiple images. The chromatic activity of FRB 20180916B-earlier and narrower activity windows at higher frequencies-can be explained as preferential magnification near the outer caustic. Finally, the intrinsic resolution of a plasma lens provides an upper limit on the transverse emission size: lenses located close to the source yield magnetospheric-scale constraints and offer a practical means of discriminating between inner- and outer-magnetospheric emission scenarios. These results suggest that plasma lensing could account for multiple complex observational features of FRBs and may play a non-negligible role in modulating their observable properties.

AI.tldr: 研究发现等离子体透镜效应（plasma lensing）能解释快速射电暴（FRBs）的复杂观测特征，包括频率漂移、偏振角跳跃和色散活动窗口，并可通过透镜位置限制发射区尺度。
AI.background: 快速射电暴（FRB）在致密磁离子环境中的传播效应及其观测信号重塑机制。
AI.data: data部分：研究使用一维高斯等离子体透镜（1D Gaussian plasma-lens）框架模拟快速射电暴（FRB）波前入射角变化及多路径传播效应，并基于FRB 20180916B的色散活动特征验证模型。
AI.method: 采用一维高斯等离子体透镜（1D Gaussian plasma-lens）模型分析快速射电暴（FRB）波前入射角微小变化对子爆发频率漂移和偏振角跃变的影响。
AI.result: 等离子体透镜效应可解释快速射电暴（FRB）观测中频率漂移、偏振角（PA）跃变和色散活动窗口等复杂特征，并限制发射区横向尺度。

title: Astrometric microlensing probes of the isolated neutron star population with Roman
summary: Notoriously hard to detect and study, isolated neutron stars (NS) could provide valuable answers to fundamental questions about stellar evolution and explosion physics. With the upcoming Roman Space Telescope, scheduled for launch in 2026, a new and powerful channel for their detection - astrometric microlensing - will become available. We set out to create a realistic sample of simulated gravitational microlensing events as observed by Roman with the Galactic Bulge Time Domain Survey. We focus in particular on the population of NS lenses, which has until now been largely understudied. We use state-of-the-art Galactic models tailored for application to microlensing by compact objects. We simulate four different NS populations with Maxwellian natal kick distributions: $\bar{v} = (150, \ 250, \ 350, \ 450)$ km/s. We apply projected Roman precision, cadence, and detectability criteria. We find the parameter space $\log_{10} t_{\rm E}$ - $\log_{10} θ_{\rm E}$, which will be accessible to Roman observations, to be maximally efficient for classification of stellar remnants. We find a feature in this space that is characteristic to NS; using this feature, optimal samples of NS candidates can be constructed from Roman-like datasets. We describe the dependence of observable parameter distributions on the assumed mean kick velocities. As the effects of natal kicks are very complex and mutually counteracting, we suggest more detailed studies focused on the dynamics of NS are needed in anticipation of Roman and future surveys. We estimate Roman will observe approximately $11\,000$ microlensing events - including $\sim100$ with NS lenses - whose both photometric and astrometric signal are detectable; the event yield decreases by $38\%$ if gap-filling low-cadence observations are not included. We make all simulated microlensing event datasets publicly available in preparation for Roman data.

AI.tldr: 利用罗曼空间望远镜（Roman Space Telescope）的微引力透镜（astrometric microlensing）技术，首次系统模拟了孤立中子星（NS）透镜事件，发现特征参数空间（$\log_{10} t_{\rm E}$ - $\log_{10} θ_{\rm E}$）可用于高效分类中子星，并预测将观测到约100例中子星透镜事件。
AI.background: 研究聚焦于利用引力微透镜（gravitational microlensing）技术探测孤立中子星（isolated neutron stars），以解决恒星演化和爆发物理中的基础问题。
AI.data: 使用针对致密天体微透镜效应优化的先进银河系模型，模拟了四种具有麦克斯韦分布初生速度（$\bar{v} = (150, \ 250, \ 350, \ 450)$ km/s）的中子星（NS）种群数据，并应用了罗曼空间望远镜（Roman Space Telescope）的预期精度、观测频率和可探测性标准。
AI.method: 采用最先进的银河系模型（Galactic models）模拟了四种具有麦克斯韦分布（Maxwellian natal kick distributions）的中子星（NS）群体，并应用了罗曼望远镜（Roman）的预期精度、观测频率和可探测性标准。
AI.result: 利用罗曼空间望远镜（Roman Space Telescope）的观测能力，在参数空间$\log_{10} t_{\rm E}$ - $\log_{10} θ_{\rm E}$中发现了一个中子星（NS）的特征性标志，可用于高效分类恒星残骸并构建最优中子星候选样本。

title: Rescaling Transforms for Local Models of Spherical Flows
comment: 16 pages, 7 figures, accepted for publication in MNRAS
summary: Previously we developed a local model for a spherically contracting/expanding gas cloud that can be used to study turbulence and small scale instabilities in such flows. In this work we generalise the super-comoving variables used in studies of cosmological structure formation to our local spherical flow model, which make it significantly easier to derive analytical solutions and analyse the interactions of more complex flows with the background. We show that a wide class of solutions to the local spherical flow model can be obtained via a mapping from the corresponding solutions in regular Cartesian flows. The rescaling of time in the transformation results in a modification of the linear instabilities that can occur in spherical flows, causing them to have a time dependent growth rate in the physical time coordinate, and can prevent slower instabilities from operating. Finally, we show that the small scale flows in isotropic contraction/expansion can be mapped directly to Cartesian, inviscid, incompressible hydrodynamics, meaning that one expects a form of rescaled Kolmogorov-turbulence at the small scale of isotropically contracting/expanding flows.

AI.tldr: 将宇宙结构形成研究中的超共动变量(super-comoving variables)推广到局部球面流模型，通过映射笛卡尔流解获得广泛解析解，并揭示球面流中线性不稳定性(linear instabilities)具有时变增长率且小尺度各向同性收缩/膨胀流可映射为无粘不可压流体动力学。
AI.background: 研究聚焦于球对称收缩/膨胀气体云（spherically contracting/expanding gas cloud）的局部模型构建及其湍流与小尺度不稳定性分析，通过推广超共动变量（super-comoving variables）方法简化解析解推导与复杂流动背景相互作用研究。
AI.data: 研究中使用的数据来源于理论推导和数值模拟（simulation），未涉及实际观测数据。
AI.method: 采用超共动变量（super-comoving variables）将宇宙学结构形成研究中的方法推广到局部球对称流动模型，便于解析求解和分析复杂流动与背景的相互作用。
AI.result: 将超共动变量(super-comoving variables)推广到局域球对称流动模型中，显著简化了复杂流动与背景相互作用的解析求解和分析过程。

title: Checking It Twice: Using [C/N]-Masses and Asteroseismic Masses as a Diagnostic of Mass Loss and Transfer on the RGB
summary: The surface [C/N] of red giants is correlated with birth mass, but not directly impacted by mass loss. Exploiting this, we compare asteroseismic masses of red giants with the same [C/N] and but different evolutionary states. We find bulk differences between stars at the beginning of the red giant branch and in the subsequent evolutionary phase, the red clump, providing a direct constraint on the strength of net RGB mass loss in field stars. We find that net mass loss decreases with metallicity and mass, matching recent studies for field giants, but contradicting expectations from the widely used Reimers' mass loss formula. We propose a mass- and metallicity-dependent Reimers' $η$ calibration that reproduces the empirical trends that we see. In addition, we identify 207 stars (3.33% of our sample) that are clear outliers from their population in these birth mass bins, which we believe are likely candidates for mass transfer events. These stars do not show any obvious discrepancies in abundances or binary properties from their counterparts. This population should be accounted for in Galactic archaeological studies. Further follow-up is required to quantify their occurrence rate and origin.

AI.tldr: 红巨星表面碳氮比([C/N])与诞生质量相关且不受质量损失直接影响，通过比较相同[C/N]但不同演化状态（红巨星分支初期与红团簇阶段）的星震学质量，发现净红巨星分支质量损失强度存在整体差异，其随金属丰度和质量增加而降低，与Reimers质量损失公式预期相矛盾，据此提出了质量与金属丰度依赖的Reimers η参数校准方案，并识别出207颗(3.33%)可能经历质量转移的异常星体。
AI.background: 研究主题为利用红巨星表面碳氮比([C/N])与初始质量的相关性，结合星震学质量比较不同演化阶段恒星的质量损失差异，并建立与金属丰度和质量相关的Reimers质量损失参数η校准关系。
AI.data: 数据来源于对红巨星（red giants）的星震学（asteroseismic）质量测量，并结合相同[C/N]值但不同演化状态（红巨星分支初期和红团簇阶段）的恒星进行比较分析。
AI.method: 利用红巨星表面碳氮比([C/N])与初始质量相关但不受质量损失直接影响的特点，通过比较相同[C/N]但不同演化阶段（红巨星分支和红团簇）的星震学质量差异，直接约束了场星中红巨星分支净质量损失的强度。
AI.result: 红巨星表面碳氮比([C/N])与诞生质量相关，但与质量损失无直接关联。

title: Rotation Period of 3I/ATLAS After Perihelion from Jet Position Angle Wobble and Photometric Variability
summary: We determine the post-perihelion rotation period of 3I/ATLAS using two independent diagnostics: the temporal modulation of the position angle (PA) of a persistent jet-like feature, and a time-series photometric light curve in the Gr (R) band. For the jet morphology, we measure the PA at multiple epochs by applying the Larson-Sekanina Rotational Gradient filter to Hubble Space Telescope images between November 20, 2025 and December 27, 2025, and model the phase-folded PA curve with weighted least-squares Fourier series up to two harmonics while scanning trial periods P to identify minima in \c{hi}2(P). For the photometry, we adopt the best-fit period from an independent 30-minute binned analysis (from a 0.25 meter telescope MPC L92) based on a refined \c{hi}2(P) profile for a sinusoidal model with nightly offsets. We find that the jet-PA modulation gives a period Pjet = 7.20 +/-0.05 h (adopting a conservative uncertainty dominated by sparse sampling and systematics), while the photometry yields Pphot = 7.136+/-0.001 h (formal 1σ uncertainty). Although the periods differ slightly, the offset is plausibly attributable to non-Gaussian systematics and aliasing. The combined data supports a post-perihelion rotation period of 7.1 h associated with precession of the jet structure around the rotation axis by 20°. The rotation axis is aligned with the sunward direction to within 20°

AI.tldr: 通过喷流位置角（PA）调制和测光（photometry）分析，确定3I/ATLAS彗星近日点后自转周期为7.1小时，并发现其喷流结构绕自转轴存在20°进动（precession）。
AI.background: 研究聚焦于利用喷流形态（jet morphology）和测光数据（photometry）测定星际彗星3I/ATLAS的近日点后自转周期（post-perihelion rotation period），并探讨其与喷流结构进动（precession）的关系。
AI.data: 数据来源包括哈勃太空望远镜（Hubble Space Telescope）在2025年11月20日至12月27日期间拍摄的图像，以及一台0.25米口径望远镜（MPC L92）采集的30分钟分箱光变曲线数据。
AI.method: 采用拉尔森-塞卡尼纳旋转梯度滤波（Larson-Sekanina Rotational Gradient filter）处理哈勃太空望远镜图像，并通过加权最小二乘傅里叶级数拟合相位折叠的位置角曲线，同时扫描试验周期以识别χ²最小值。
AI.result: 通过喷流位置角（PA）调制和测光光变曲线分析，确定3I/ATLAS彗星近日点后自转周期为7.1小时，伴随喷流结构绕自转轴20°进动。

title: The Deeper, Wider, Faster programme's first DECam optical data release
comment: 16 pages, 9 figures, 7 tables, published in PASA
summary: The transient and variable optical sky is relatively poorly characterised on fast ($<$1$\,$hr) timescales. With the Dark Energy Camera (DECam), the Deeper, Wider, Faster programme (DWF) probes a unique parameter space with its deep (median of $g\sim22.2$ AB mag), minute-cadence imaging. In this work, we present DWF's first data release which comprises high cadence photometry extracted from $\sim$12000 images and 166 hours of telescope time. We present a novel data processing pipeline, $\texttt{dwf-postpipe}$, developed to identify sources and extract their light curves. The accuracy of the photometry is assessed by cross-matching to public catalogues. In addition, we injected a population of synthetic GRB afterglows into a subset of the DWF DECam imaging to compare the efficiency of our pipeline with a standard difference imaging approach. Both pipelines show performance and reliably recover injected transients with peak magnitudes $g<22$ AB mag with an efficiency of $97.24^{+0.7}_{-1.0}$ percent for \texttt{dwf-postpipe} and $96.14^{+0.9}_{-1.1}$ percent for a difference imaging approach. However, we find that $\texttt{dwf-postpipe}$ is less likely to recover transients appearing in galaxies that are brighter or comparable in brightness to the transient itself. To demonstrate the power of the data in this release, we conduct a search for uncatalogued variable stars in a single night of DWF DECam imaging and find ten pulsating variables, two eclipsing binaries and one ZZ ceti. We also conduct a search for variable phenomena in the Chandra Deep Field South, a Rubin deep drilling field, and identify two flares from likely UV ceti type stars.

AI.tldr: DWF（Deeper, Wider, Faster）项目利用DECam（Dark Energy Camera）首次发布的高时间分辨率（分钟级）光变数据（覆盖166小时观测和12000张图像）及其新型数据处理流程（dwf-postpipe），在g波段峰值星等<22 AB mag的暂现源检测效率达97.24%，并发现13颗未编目变星（10颗脉动变星、2颗食双星、1颗ZZ Ceti型白矮星）及2颗UV Ceti型耀星。
AI.background: 研究背景聚焦于快速时标（<1小时）下瞬变（transient）和可变光学天象的表征不足问题，利用暗能量相机（DECam）通过Deeper, Wider, Faster（DWF）项目填补深度（中位g波段约22.2星等）和分钟级连续成像的参数空白。
AI.data: 数据来源于Deeper, Wider, Faster (DWF)项目使用暗能量相机(DECam)获取的约12000张图像和166小时望远镜观测时间的高时间分辨率测光数据，并通过交叉匹配公共星表验证测光精度。
AI.method: 采用了一种新颖的数据处理流程（$\texttt{dwf-postpipe}$）来识别源并提取其光变曲线，并通过将合成伽马射线暴（GRB）余辉注入图像子集来评估测光精度。
AI.result: 开发的新型数据处理管道（dwf-postpipe）能高效识别源并提取光变曲线，对峰值星等g<22 AB mag的暂现源恢复效率达97.24^{+0.7}_{-1.0}%，但较难恢复出现在亮度相当或更亮星系中的暂现源。

title: Unveiling Ionized Jet Morphologies: Sub-arcsecond VLA Observations of Compact Radio Sources
summary: We present sub-arcsecond ($θ\sim0.1^{\prime\prime}$) resolution VLA 1.3 cm continuum and 22.2 GHz H$_2$O maser observations toward 15 compact radio continuum sources with rising spectral index and 8 string-like radio continuum structures in the Rosero et al. (2016, 2019) survey. Three different morphologies are observed: elongated or double-peak string-like structure (6 out of 23 cases), a collection of distinct continuum peaks (4 out of 23 cases), and single compact sources (13 out of 23 cases). The majority of H$_2$O maser spots detected are within a sky-projected distance of $\sim5,000$ au from the radio continuum peaks and tend to be well aligned and distributed in an elongated structure when more than three spots are observed. We generally recover less emission than Rosero et al. (2016, 2019), which together with the fact that more than half of the jet candidates in our survey appear mostly compact, suggest core/halo shock structures even on small scales. We also detected proper motion in 10 cases and measured an average projected velocity of approximately 120 km s$^{-1}$. Radio brightness variability is detected in at least two cases, possibly due to weak accretion bursts. This work, together with our previous molecular jet study, provides further evidence that support the main source of ionization in the studied sources is shocks, yet collimation is only observed in 4 cases. We conclude that the available data supports the thermal jet classification of 7 sources, and the ionized jet interpretation is further supported in 16 sources.

AI.tldr: 通过亚角秒分辨率观测发现，23个研究对象中7个被归类为热喷流（thermal jet），16个支持电离喷流（ionized jet）解释，主要证据包括H2O脉泽（maser）与射电连续谱峰的空间分布关联、4例准直性结构及10例平均投影速度约120 km/s的自行运动。
AI.background: 研究聚焦于通过高分辨率射电连续谱和水脉泽（H$_2$O maser）观测，探究致密射电源和细长射电结构的形态学特征及其激波电离机制。
AI.data: 数据来源于甚大天线阵（VLA）1.3厘米连续谱和22.2 GHz水脉泽（H$_2$O maser）观测，针对Rosero等人（2016, 2019）巡天中15个具有上升谱指数的致密射电连续谱源和8个弦状射电连续结构。
AI.method: 采用甚大天线阵(VLA)1.3厘米连续谱和22.2 GHz水脉泽(H$_2$O maser)观测技术，空间分辨率达亚角秒级($θ\sim0.1^{\prime\prime}$)。
AI.result: 在23个目标源中观测到三种形态：6个呈拉长或双峰细丝状结构，4个为离散连续谱峰集合，13个为单一致密源。

title: KMT-2025-BLG-1616Lb: First Microlensing Bound Planet From DREAMS
summary: We present observations and analysis of the bound planetary microlensing event KMT-2025-BLG-1616. The planetary signal was captured by the Korea Microlensing Telescope Network (KMTNet) and the DECam Rogue Earths and Mars Survey (DREAMS). DREAMS's minute-cadence observations break the central/resonant degeneracy in the binary-lens models. The color of the faint source star ($I=22$) is measured from the DREAMS's $r - z$ color. The planetary system has a planet-host mass ratio of $q \sim 5 \times 10^{-4}$. A Bayesian analysis yields a host-star mass of $\sim 0.3\,M_\odot$, a planetary mass of $\sim 40\,M_{\oplus}$, a projected planet-host separation of $\sim 1.6~\mathrm{au}$, and a lens distance of $\sim 7.5~\mathrm{kpc}$. Based on the photometric precision achieved by DREAMS for this event, we simulate free-floating planet (FFP) detections and find that DREAMS is sensitive to Mars-mass FFPs in the Galactic bulge and Moon-mass FFPs in the Galactic disk.

AI.tldr: 通过KMTNet和DREAMS对KMT-2025-BLG-1616微引力透镜事件的观测分析，发现一颗质量约40倍地球质量的行星绕一颗质量约0.3倍太阳质量的主星运行，轨道投影距离约1.6天文单位，并证实DREAMS能探测银河系核球中火星质量自由漂浮行星(FFP)和银盘中月球质量自由漂浮行星(FFP)。
AI.background: 该研究聚焦于利用微引力透镜（microlensing）技术探测银河系内行星系统（包括束缚行星和自由漂浮行星（FFP））的动力学特征和统计分布。
AI.data: 数据来源于韩国微引力透镜望远镜网络（KMTNet）和DECam流浪地球与火星巡天（DREAMS）的观测数据。
AI.method: 采用贝叶斯分析(Bayesian analysis)推断宿主恒星质量、行星质量、投影行星-宿主间距及透镜距离。
AI.result: 行星系统具有约5×10⁻⁴的星-行质量比（planet-host mass ratio），贝叶斯分析显示宿主恒星质量约0.3倍太阳质量（M⊙）、行星质量约40倍地球质量（M⊕）、投影星-行间距约1.6天文单位（au）、透镜距离约7.5千秒差距（kpc）。

title: Fundamental Properties of Novae in M31
comment: 26 pages, 11 figures, 8 tables; accepted for publication in The Astrophysical Journal Supplements
summary: The peak luminosities and rates of decline for a large sample of novae recently published by Clark et al. have been analyzed using the Yaron et al. nova models to estimate fundamental properties of the M31 nova population. The apparent white dwarf (WD) mass distribution is approximately Gaussian with a mean $\langle M_\mathrm{WD} \rangle = 1.16\pm0.14~M_{\odot}$. When corrected for recurrence-time bias, the mean drops to $\langle M_\mathrm{WD} \rangle = 1.07~M_\odot$. The average WD mass of the M31 nova sample is found to be remarkably similar to that found by Shara et al. in their study of 82 Galactic novae, but $\sim0.15~M_\odot$ more massive than the mean recently determined by Schaefer in his comprehensive study of more than 300 systems. As expected, the average WD mass for the recurrent novae included in the M31 sample, $\langle M_\mathrm{WD} \rangle = 1.33\pm0.08~M_{\odot}$, is significantly higher than that for novae generally. Other parameters of interest, such as the accretion rate, velocity of the ejecta, and the predicted recurrence time, are characterized by skewed distributions with large spreads about means of $\langle \log \dot M ~(M_\odot~\mathrm{yr}^{-1}) \rangle \simeq -9.27$, $\langle V_\mathrm{max} \rangle \simeq 1690~\mathrm{km~s}^{-1}$, and $\langle \log P_\mathrm{rec}~\mathrm{(yr)} \rangle \simeq 4.39$, respectively. The role of hibernation in affecting the $\dot M$ and $P_\mathrm{rec}$ distributions is briefly discussed. Finally, the nova properties were studied as a function of apparent position (isophotal radius) in M31, with the preponderance of evidence failing to establish any clear dependence on stellar population.

AI.tldr: 通过分析M31（仙女座星系）新星样本的光度峰值和衰减率，发现其白矮星（WD）质量分布呈高斯分布，平均质量为1.16±0.14 M⊙（校正后为1.07 M⊙），与银河系新星相似但比Schaefer研究的系统高约0.15 M⊙，且再发新星的平均质量（1.33±0.08 M⊙）显著高于普通新星，同时表征了吸积率、抛射物速度和再发时间等参数的偏态分布特征，但未发现新星性质与M31位置存在明显关联。
AI.background: 研究聚焦于利用新星模型分析M31（仙女座星系）新星样本的白矮星（WD）质量分布及其相关参数，探讨其与银河系新星系统的异同及休眠机制对吸积率和重现周期的影响。
AI.data: 数据来源于Clark等人近期发表的大样本新星峰值光度及衰减率观测结果，结合Yaron等人的新星模型进行分析。
AI.method: 采用Yaron等人的新星模型（Yaron et al. nova models）分析M31新星样本的光度峰值和衰减率以估算其基本性质。
AI.result: M31新星样本中白矮星（WD）的视质量分布近似高斯分布，平均质量为1.16±0.14 M⊙，经复发时间偏差校正后降至1.07 M⊙。
